thread.title: Great hotel if you're not a light sleeper
thread.title_full: Great hotel if you're not a light sleeper - Review of Hotel Les Jardins de Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lottieholder2014
title: Great hotel if you're not a light sleeper
text: The hotel was great, comfortable, friendly, good breakfast and close to public transport with local restaurants, but the area has a lively night scene with lots of traffic, noisy bars and discos until 3 and 4am. Unfortunately the hotel double glazing does not eliminate this, so avoid, if this will keep you awake.
